text:
Nice idea, but in practische the same result as removing the default text. The only problem with that is that our non-tech savvy users might not find the modules at all.

But come to think about it, those users will properly just copy a previous post. I think you have pointed me on the right track Stephanie!

Sometimes for hidden modules on pages, I'll add in some content between `{% if request.postDict.inpageEditorUI %} {# Something here #} {% endif %}`  tags.

Anything you add there will only appear in the editor, so you could add in instructions, or a "button" in the case of a page that will open the sidebar... etc. I usually have a little note saying it only appears in the editor as well in case they're nervous about it being on the live page.
